member.name: T:AdaptorGeneration.Pattern.PatternDescription
member.summary: A PatternDescription has a number of attributes to describe all aspects of a design pattern that may be helpful to choose a certain pattern for adaptation.

member.name: M:AdaptorGeneration.Pattern.PatternDescription.addQoSAttribute(AdaptorGeneration.Pattern.QoSAttribute)
member.summary: Adds a QoSattribute to the list of attributes the description holds.

member.name: M:AdaptorGeneration.Pattern.PatternDescription.addAdapterTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a template to the descriptions list of adapter templates. The filename of the template has to be given as a parameter. By default the templates should available in the same directory as the xml pattern description.

member.name: M:AdaptorGeneration.Pattern.PatternDescription.addPredictionTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a template to the descriptions list of prediction templates. The filename of the template has to be given as a parameter. By default the templates should available in the same directory as the xml pattern description.

member.name: T:AdaptorGeneration.Pattern.PatternDescriptionParser
member.summary: This class implements a parser for design pattern descriptions in XML. Some parts of the parser were taken from XmlSeffParser.

member.name: M:AdaptorGeneration.Pattern.PatternDescriptionParser.GetValueOfChild(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator,System.String)
member.summary: This method was copied from XmlSeffParser.

member.name: M:AdaptorGeneration.Pattern.PatternDescriptionParser.OnValidateError(System.Object,System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventArgs)
member.summary: This method was copied from XmlSeffParser.

member.name: M:AdaptorGeneration.Pattern.PatternDescriptionParser.XmlValid(System.String)
member.summary: This method was copied from XmlSeffParser.

member.name: M:AdaptorGeneration.Pattern.PatternDescriptionParser.parseDescription(System.String)
member.summary: This is the main parsing method. The XML-file containing the pattern description is validated against the DTD and other initialisations are made. After that the methods for parsing the separate parts of the XML-file are called.
member.param: The XML file containing the pattern description
member.returns: A PatternDescription object containing the same information as the given XML file.

member.name: M:AdaptorGeneration.Pattern.PatternDescriptionParser.ReadGeneralDescription(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator,AdaptorGeneration.Pattern.PatternDescription)
member.summary: This method parses the general information of the pattern description, including the name, general description and the source of the pattern.
member.param: An XPathNavigator for the parsed XML file

member.name: M:AdaptorGeneration.Pattern.PatternDescriptionParser.ReadQoSEffects(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator,AdaptorGeneration.Pattern.PatternDescription)
member.summary: This methods parses the QoS effects described in the XML file.
member.param: An XPathNavigator for the parsed XML file

members.member:
This methods parses the list of templates needed to created the adapter that can be used to adjust the QoS mismatches of the pattern.
/// An XPathNavigator for the parsed XML file The final PatternDescription object.

member.name: M:AdaptorGeneration.Pattern.PatternDescriptionParser.ReadPredictionTemplates(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator,AdaptorGeneration.Pattern.PatternDescription)
member.summary: This method parses the list of templates that can be used to created the prediction model for the performance of the generated adapter.
member.param: An XPathNavigator for the parsed XML file

member.name: T:AdaptorGeneration.Pattern.QoSAttribute
member.summary: A QoSAttribute describes the suitability of a design pattern for solving problems with certain QoS attributes. The class has the attributes name and suitability, where "suitability" describes the suitability of the pattern to solve a problem with the QoS attribute referred to by "name". Suitability is a string which at the moment should have one of the following values: ++, +, 0, -, --

member.name: M:AdaptorGeneration.Pattern.QoSAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a new QoSAttribute with the given name.
